answers.text:
Hello, 
I found some resources that may be helpful for you. 
California State University’s General Counsel asks for feedback from the CSU community annually. Here are their survey questions and results:  http://www.calstate.edu/GC/survey/2011_survey.shtml 
Columbia, SC has a general internal services survey with specific questions relating to the legal department: 
http://transformgov.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14672/Internal_Services_Survey 
Finally, here is sample survey from a private law firm asking for client feedback: 
http://reeselawoffice.com/client_survey.php 
Pamela Weir 
Management Intern 
Alliance for Innovation

author: Robbie Gribble
text:
Does anyone have a survey they would not mind sharing?  I am trying to create a survey that our legal department could use in order for us to get customer feedback from our departments on our process as a whole.
I am also trying to create a survey that we could use in order to get customer feedback from our contract Prosecutors.
title: Employee/Client Surveys
